DOC.brief_summary: Clinical manifestation rotator cuff tear include shoulder pain , weakness , stiffness . The level pain often limiting factor assess shoulder range motion strength pre-operatively . Pain even cause weakness due muscle atrophy . The purpose study understand effect pain measure constant shoulder score patient ultrasound guide subacromial ( out end shoulder blade ) injection lidocaine ( local anesthetic numbing agent ) compare saline ( salt solution ) , patient indicate arthroscopic rotator cuff repair .
